attributes.action: tighter controls on private parking companies
attributes.additional_details: At present private parking companies that have access to dvla records have to be registered with the Bpa, this is NOT an independant body but a private company itself, that makes a profit from each of its members, ie the private parking companies, i feel that the government must act immediatly to have private parking companies regulated by a non profit making body that will not be influenced by how much money they can bank and bring fairness back to the british public.
